channel.title: Reactome on Badran Elshenawy
channel.description: Recent content in Reactome on Badran Elshenawy

item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis – Post 16: GSEA - When Gene Lists Aren't Enough!
item.description: Discover GSEA’s power to detect coordinated pathway changes using complete expression datasets. Learn advanced enrichment analysis techniques that reveal biological insights hidden from traditional ORA methods.

item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis – Post 15: Human-Curated Pathway Precision with Reactome!
item.description: Master Reactome pathway analysis for human-focused research. Explore how expert-curated pathways provide clinical precision for disease studies, drug development, and precision medicine applications that GO and KEGG can’t match.
